Taking mediocrity to new levels of meh. I added the US flag so you have an idea where my photos are from. People post photos of insects and other things and many times I have no idea where on the globe they were taken.

My simple rule for following: You have to post some of your own stuff, not just boosts. Boosts are nice, but who are YOU?

Artist working in many different styles and mediums. I paint what is in the moment with what I have on hand. the dominant paradigm is what was once the avant-garde. Now the art world is oversaturated with abstract, ready made and conceptual art.

I love to make art for the love of art not some jumped up linguistic nonsense. I love brushwork, color and ideas but prefer to create things that don't require three phd's to interpret.

Old, grumpy git. I don't eat Tofu, but am otherwise a fully paid up member of the 'Wokerati' so reviled by our Home Secretary.

I've been a student of Classical Guitar since retiring, and can now read music reasonably. I've played Acoustic Guitar, intermittently, for most of my adult life. I've also taken up the Mandolin in recent years. I'm studying Trad Irish and Bluegrass styles. And. Loving. It!
Just learning about hashtags... #fbpe #wokerati #ClassicalGuitar #Mandolin #MMT
